Package com.oracle.truffle.api.strings

Class MutableTruffleString.AsMutableTruffleStringNode

java.lang.Object
com.oracle.truffle.api.nodes.Node
com.oracle.truffle.api.strings.MutableTruffleString.AsMutableTruffleStringNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
NodeInterface, Cloneable
Enclosing class:
MutableTruffleString
public abstract static class MutableTruffleString.AsMutableTruffleStringNode extends Node
Node to get a AbstractTruffleString as a MutableTruffleString. See execute(AbstractTruffleString, TruffleString.Encoding) for details.
Since:
22.1

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public abstract MutableTruffleString execute(AbstractTruffleString a, TruffleString.Encoding expectedEncoding)
      If the given string is already a MutableTruffleString, return it. If it is a TruffleString, create a new MutableTruffleString, copying the immutable string's contents.
      Since:
      22.1
